info.title: ALIS API
info.description: This API will be responsible for overall data distribution and authorization.

post.summary: Queue HL7 message for processing. DEPRECATED: Use '/pharmacy/inbox/queue' instead

get.summary: Search for company by company key

parameters.name: companyKey
parameters.description: Assigned company key

parameters.name: invoiceStartDate
parameters.description: Defaults to first day of current month, inclusive

parameters.name: invoiceEndDate
parameters.description: Defaults to last day of current month, inclusive

get.description:
Returns a list of GL transactions for the authenticated user within the specified
            month and year. Limited by company/community access

parameters.name: monthAndYear
parameters.description: The month and year to filter transactions by. Defaults to current month and year.

schema.description: The month and year to filter transactions by. Defaults to current month and year.

parameters.name: communityId
parameters.description: The community identifier to filter transactions by.

schema.description: The community identifier to filter transactions by.

parameters.name: payerType
parameters.description: The payer type to filter transactions by.

schema.description: The payer type to filter transactions by.

get.description:
Returns a list of recorded care for residents that the authenticated user has access to. The data returned
is within the specified date range (if a date is not provided then that date will default to the start or end of the current month).
Limited by company/community access.

parameters.name: careStartDate
parameters.description: Defaults to start of current month, inclusive (Search is limited to past 6 months of data)

schema.description: Defaults to start of current month, inclusive (Search is limited to past 6 months of data)

parameters.name: careEndDate
parameters.description: Defaults to end of current month, inclusive.

schema.description: Defaults to end of current month, inclusive.

parameters.name: communityId
parameters.description: The community identifier to filter records by.

schema.description: The community identifier to filter records by.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Defaults to start of current month, inclusive (Search is limited to past 3 months of data)

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Defaults to end of current month, inclusive

get.description: Returns a list of Product Types for the authenticated user. Limited by company/community access

parameters.name: communityId
parameters.description: The community identifier to filter product types by.

get.description:
Returns a list of prospect tasks that the authenticated user has access to.
Limited by company/community access.

parameters.name: communityId
parameters.description: The community identifier to filter records by.

schema.description: The community identifier to filter records by.

parameters.name: localTaskDueAtStartDate
parameters.description: Date used in date range to filter tasks by their due date. Must be supplied with LocalTaskDueAtEndDate

schema.description: Date used in date range to filter tasks by their due date. Must be supplied with LocalTaskDueAtEndDate

parameters.name: localTaskDueAtEndDate
parameters.description: Date used in date range to filter tasks by their due date. Must be supplied with LocalTaskDueAtStartDate

schema.description: Date used in date range to filter tasks by their due date. Must be supplied with LocalTaskDueAtStartDate

parameters.name: isComplete
parameters.description: Filters the tasks by whether they are completed or not.

schema.description: Filters the tasks by whether they are completed or not.

get.description: Returns a list containing resident move in and move out information. Limited by company/community access

200.description: List of resident move in and move out information

get.description: Returns a list of staff for the authenticated user. Limited by company/community access

get.description:
Returns a list of resident vaccinations with dose information for the specified resident ID.
            Excludes vaccinations that were refused by the resident.

parameters.name: residentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the resident whose vaccinations are being retrieved.

200.description: List of resident vaccinations with dose information included

403.description: Not authorized for the ALIS app store or invalid permissions to access endpoint.

post.description:
Allows the user to record vitals for a resident.

Request Body:

`Array of Vital Records`

Properties:
  • VitalType: The vital type that is being recorded for the resident. (Temp, BP, Glucose, Pulse, O2, Weight, Respiration)
  • Value1: First reading for the vital.
  • Value2: Second reading for the vital.
  • RecordingTime: When the vital was recorded. Defaults to the current UTC date if not present.
  • Notes: Notes to associate with the vital recording.

parameters.name: residentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier assigned to the resident.

parameters.name: X-Install-Key
parameters.description: Vendor install key to identify an app vendor. Required only if vendor pushes data as an ALIS user.

200.description: List of vital IDs for the vitals that were recorded

post.summary: Generates a user access token with a username and password
Refreshes an expired user access token using a refresh token

id.description: Unique identifier of the care item. Auto assigned in ALIS and cannot be changed. Is not globaly unique, always use in context of company textkey.

name.description: Name of care item displayed throughout ALIS and related apps in dropdowns and on screen. This is required field and will always have a value.

categoryName.description: General group that this care item belongs to. This is required field and will always have a value.

instructions.description: Steps for performing the care item, supplied by a clinician at the community. This is optional and may return null or empty string.
instructions.example: Staff to provide all bathing tasks (washing hair, cleansing entire body, etc.)

possibleOutcome.description: Possible statuses when recording care delivery. For example: completed, not completed. Each care item can have a custom, user defined list of outcome statuses. Most will be completed/not completed.

estimatedTime.description: Time it takes to deliver the care, in minutes.

isDisabled.description: Indicate if the care item is available for selection. Disabled items may still be in use by historical/pre-existing records. Care items cannot be deleted, only disabled.

hideCareTimes.description: Setting that when true indicates the care item can be recorded at any time. When false the item must be recorded at the listed time.
Setting that when true indicates the care item can be recorded at any time. When false the item must be recorded at the listed time.

total.description: Required. Count of all current residents (including residents on leave) with this product type

communityId.description: Required. Internal ALIS id for the community

communityName.description: Required. Internal ALIS name for the community

totalCensus.description: Required. Count of all current residents (including residents on leave)

breakdownByProductType.description: Required. A breakdown of current residents (including residents on leave) broken down by product type

contactPreference.description: Optional. Sets how the main contact prefers to be contacted. Possible options are: any, email, email_and_mail, mail, phone, and do_not_contact. Defaults to any.

notes.description: Optional. Note to display in the Notes section of the Prospect. Use story field if you want the note to appear at the top of the Prospect page.

scheduleTour.description: Set to true to schedule a tour as a new prospect Task.

utcTourDate.description: Date and time in UTC the tour should be scheduled for. Must be a valid, future date when 'scheduleTour' is set to true.

tourNote.description: Tour note attached to the scheduled tour.

tourAssignedAgent.description: Sales agent staff ID that the tour is assigned to. Defaults to first sales agent in the list by alphabetical order.

utmSource.description: Optional. Additional lead source details, eg. facebook_post. Open text field of 255 chars.

utmMedium.description: Optional. Type of link used, eg. email or facebook_ad. Open text field of 255 chars.

utmCampaign.description: Optional. Marketing campaign which generated the lead, eg. spring_sale. Open text field of 255 chars.

utmTerm.description: Optional. Term used if lead originated from search, eg. assisted+living. Open text field of 255 chars.

utmContent.description: Optional. Visual content associated to the link eg. companylogo. Open text field of 255 chars.

taskType.description: Required. Type of task being created - must match a valid type defined in ALIS. Note: types can be customized on a per community basis.

utcDueDateTime.description: Required. Date and time in UTC when the task is due or the date of the appointment. Date must be in the future.

assigneeId.description: Optional. Staff member that this task is assigned to. Must match a valid ALIS Staff ID.

note.description: Optional. A note or description to accompany the task. We can accept an HTML format.

externalNoteId.description: Required. Your unique ID for this record. Used in reporting validation errors and tracking origin of the note.

type.description: Required. Type of observation being created. Must match a valid type defined in ALIS. Note: types can be customized on a per community basis.

utcDateTime.description: Optional. Date and time in UTC when the observation was recorded in. Defaults to now if omitted or null. Cannot be in the future.

summary.description: Required. Text to added to the resident's chart of observations.

author.description: Optional. Name of the person that originally authrored this note. The name will be appeded to the Observation summary in ALIS because the record will display the partner's name.

severity.description: Optional. One of 'normal' or 'critical'. Defaults to 'normal'.

keepActiveFor.description: Optional. One of one day '1d', one week '1w' or one month '1m'. Defaults to '1d'.

locked.description: Optional. Defaults to false. If true, the observation will not be editable.

reason.description: Required. Reason for deleting the record. This will appear in the ALIS audit record.

unitId.description: Object ID for the unit (specific bed in a room). Required field and will always return a value.

unitNumber.description: Number you see on the door. Is required in ALIS and will always return a not-null value.

bedNumber.description: ALIS defined letter to each bed in the room. One of: A, B, C, D. Most commonly it will be either A or B. Is required in ALIS and will always return a not-null value.

primaryOccupantIds.description: List of residents currently assigned to the room as the primary occupant. Used for occupancy management, the primary occupant is responsible for the lease and paying bills associated to the room. ALIS allows more than one resident to be assigned to a bed as the primary occupant.

secondOccupantIds.description: List of residents currently assigned to the room as the primary occupant. Used for occupancy management, the secondary resident is not responsible for bills and is usually a spouse that is sharing the room. ALIS allows more than one resident to be assigned to a bed as the second occupant.

isDisabled.description: Rooms can be disabled if they are no longer available for occupancy. This is a rare event, but can occur if the floor plan of the community is updated.

isOccupied.description: Easy way to determine if the room is occupied or vacant. Will return true if there is at least one primary occupant assiged to at least one bed, regardless of which bed A or B.

floor.description: Name of the floor where the room is located. This is optional in ALIS and may return a default value of Floor1, Floor2, etc.

floorId.description: Required. Unique ID of the Floor inside the community.

hall.description: Name of the hall where the room is located. This is optional in ALIS and may return a default value of Main.

categoryId.description: Object ID for the category. Required field and will always return a value.

floorHallId.description: Required. Unique ID of the Hall inside the community on a specific floor.

category.description: Care services that the room is designed for, such as Assisted Living or Memory Care. This is required in ALIS and will always return a not-null value. The list is user defined so the values will vary across communities.

type.description: Style of room based on size or location in the building, for example: Studio, 1 Bedroom, Corner Suite, etc. This is required in ALIS and will always return a not-null value. The list is user defined so the values will vary across communities.

size.description: Square footage of the room. This is optional in ALIS and may return null.

marketRate.description: Market rent rate in US dollars set for this room used for budgeting and management. This is optional in ALIS and may return null.

ceilingPrice.description: Maximum allowed rent rate in US dollars for this room. This is optional in ALIS and may return null.

floorPrice.description: Minimum allowed rent rate in US dollars for this room. This is optional in ALIS and may return null.

description.description: Description of the room when presenting to the resident or on brocures. This is optional in ALIS and may return null or empty string.
description.example: Beautiful corner unit with lots of sunlight. Private bathroom and easy access to the elevator.

comments.description: Private notes about the room that are never shared with residents/family and used internally by staff. This is optional in ALIS and may return null or empty string.
comments.example: Near elevator so can be noisy. Carpet needs replacement.

monthAndYear.description: The month and year to filter transactions by. Defaults to current month and year.

communityId.description: The community identifier to filter transactions by.

payerType.description: The payer type to filter transactions by.

communityId.description: The community identifier to filter records by.

localTaskDueAtStartDate.description: Date used in date range to filter tasks by their due date. Must be supplied with LocalTaskDueAtEndDate

localTaskDueAtEndDate.description: Date used in date range to filter tasks by their due date. Must be supplied with LocalTaskDueAtStartDate

isComplete.description: Filters the tasks by whether they are completed or not.

communityId.description: Required. ALIS unique community ID where the event occured.

externalResidentId.description: Required. Nurse call system's unique ID for the resident that generated this event. Can be any alphanumeric value.

residentId.description: Optional. ALIS unique ID for the resident that generated this event. ALIS will display the event under this resident's profile. If not provided you must provide a valid residentProfile value.

uniqueEventId.description: Required. Nurse call system's unique ID for this event. Can be any alphanumeric value.

location.description: Optional. Identify where the event occured for reporting purposes. Value must be one of: room, bathroom, hallway, dining_room, living_room, common_area, activity_room, other. Defaults to other if not provided or when bad value provided.

locationOther.description: Optional. Additional details about the location. Use this with location value of "other" if your location values do not map to the ALIS set.

deviceType.description: Optional. Identify how the alert was generated for reporting purposes. Value must be one of: pendant, cord, watch, other. Defaults to "other" if not provided or when bad value provided.

deviceTypeOther.description: Optional. Additional details about the device. Use this with device value of "other" if your device values do not map to the ALIS set.

eventType.description: Optional. Indicate reason for the event for reporting purposes. Must be one of: emergency, fall, concierge, geofence, other. Defaults to other if not provided.

eventTypeOther.description: Optional. Additional details on the reason for the event. Use with eventType of other to list your specific event type.

status.description: Optional. Indicate if the call is still active or it has been completed. You can send the same event multiple times and ALIS will perform an update on an existing event based on the uniqueEventId. Value must be one of: active, completed. Defaults to completed if not provided.

eventNote.description: Optional. User entered notes collected as part of answering the call.
eventNote.example: Found resident on the floor. Assisted them back into bed.

startDateTime.description: Required. Date and time in UTC when the event first started.

ackDateTime.description: Optional. Date and time in UTC when the staff acknowledged the event and started answering it. Must be greater than startDateTime and less than endDateTime.

endDateTime.description: Optional. Date and time in UTC when the call was completed/fully answered. Value must be greater than both startDateTime and ackDateTime. Defaults to 1 min after startDateTime.

additionalEventDetails.description: Optional. Any vendor specific name/value pair that's related to this event. These values are displayed in ALIS alongside the event. Example use cases include sensor data collected at time of event, device serial numbers, etc.

externalStaffId.description: Optional. Vendor's unique ID of the staff that answered the call. Used for matching to ALIS staff record.

staffId.description: Optional. ALIS staff ID that answered the call. Used to associate the event to an ALIS staff member. Typically provided by vendors that have mapped their staff records to ALIS IDs and deployed devices where they can uniquely determine who answered the call.

RecordNurseCallEventResident.description: Optional. Data used by ALIS to match a resident that this event should be associated to. Failed matches are queued in ALIS for a user to manually match. Nurse call events are queued until the resident is matched. If not provided you must provide a valid value for residentId.

RecordNurseCallEventStaff.description: Optional. Data used to match the vendor's staff to an ALIS staff record so we can associate the event to who answered the call. ALIS will queue all records when the profile can't be automatically matched.

careStartDate.description: Defaults to start of current month, inclusive (Search is limited to past 6 months of data)

careEndDate.description: Defaults to end of current month, inclusive.

communityId.description: The community identifier to filter records by.

residentId.description: Unique ID associated with this resident.

reason.description: Reason for performing the evaluation. Customized by each community. Examples include: Initial Eval, 90 Day Eval, etc.

evaluationFormName.description: Name of the assessment template used for this evaluation.

status.description: Current status of the evaluation, one of: in progress, completed or expired. Note: in-progress evaluations may still return care level and fee information that is not yet finalized.

careLevel.description: Current care level as determined by this evaluation. Care levels are custom to each community.

carePoints.description: Current care points as determined by this evaluation. Points can represent minutes, dollars or be abstract.

careFee.description: Current care fee for assessed care level. Note: this excludes care packages. Sum the care fee and all care pacakges to get a total for the cost of care.

carePackages.description: Additional care packages triggered by the evaluation. Will return empty list if packages are not triggered or configured.

utcEvaluationCompletionDate.description: Date when the evaluation was performed.

utcServicePlanCompletionDate.description: Date when the resulting service plan was completed. This is when the care plan and care aid lists are updated.

utcNextEvaluationDate.description: Date when the next evaluation is due. This is also the expiration date of the current assessment.

nextEvaluationReason.description: Reason for the next evaluation. This is set by the evaluating clinician at time of completing the current evaluation.

evaluationCompletedBy.description: Full name of staff that filled in the evaluation.

servicePlanCompletedBy.description: Full name of staff that finalized the service plan.

internalNote.description: Notes for internal staff coordination. Not visible to the resident or family members.

externalNote.description: Notes that appear on the service plan in the Comments section for resident and family to see.

isEvaluationSigned.description: Indicates if the evaluation was fully signed by all parties.

isServicePlanSigned.description: Indicates if the service plan was fully signed by all parties.

leaveId.description: Required. Internal ALIS id for the leave record

communityId.description: Required. Internal ALIS id for the associated community

residentId.description: Required. Internal ALIS id for the associated resident

residentStatus.description: Required. The status of the associated resident. One of 'Prospect', 'Applicant', 'Resident', 'Moved Out', 'Transferred Out'

leaveDestination.description: Required. The destination associated with the leave record

isComplete.description: Required. Denotes whether the leave is completed or active

utcStartDateTime.description: Required. The start time of the leave in UTC

utcScheduledEndDateTime.description: Optional. The scheduled end time of the leave in UTC

utcActualEndDateTime.description: Optional. The actual completion time of the leave in UTC. Will always have a value if IsComplete is true.

alisId.description: The internal ALIS identifier for the resident.

firstName.description: The first name of the resident in ALIS.

lastName.description: The last name of the resident in ALIS.

nickName.description: The nickname name of the resident in ALIS.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the resident in ALIS.

externalId.description: The identifier of the resident in the external system.

status.description: The status of the mapping record. Will be one of 'Mapped' or 'Unmapped'

careLevel.description: Resident's current assessed acuity level. These are defined by each community.

careLevelPoints.description: Total points based on current care level. Points can represent time, dollars or other measures. These are defined by each community.

evaluationDate.description: Date the resident was last assessed and the care level was assigned.

evaluationExpirationDate.description: Date when a new assessment is needed because the current evaluation expires.

unitId.description: Object ID for the unit (specific bed in a room). Can be used with floor plan endpoint to lookup unit details like the category, market rate, etc. Required field and will always return a value.

floor.description: Name of the floor where the room is located. This is optional in ALIS and may return a default value of Floor1, Floor2, etc.

hall.description: Name of the hall where the room is located. This is optional in ALIS and may return a default value of Main.

roomNumber.description: Number you see on the door. Sometimes referred to as unitNumber. Is required in ALIS and will always return a not-null value.

bedLetter.description: ALIS defined letter to each bed in the room. One of: A, B, C, D. Most commonly it will be either A or B. Is required in ALIS and will always return a not-null value.

occupantType.description: Either primary or secondary. Is required in ALIS and will always return a value.

isActiveAssignment.description: Used to determine current versus historical records.

assignmentDateUTC.description: Date room was assigned to this resident. Is required in ALIS will always return a value.

endDateUTC.description: Date when the room was un-assigned, indicating resident vacated the room. Will be null for active assignments. All historical records will return a valid date.

assignmentDate.description: Defaults to financial/physical move in date if not provided.

externalLeadId.description: Change the mapped external ID associated to this ALIS Prospect.

prospectDateOfBirth.description: Must be a valid date that's in the past.

prospectProductType.description: Must be valid product type configured for this community.

prospectEmail.description: Must be a valid email address.

prospectPhone.description: Must be a valid phone number.

inquiryDate.description: Must be a valid past date.

source.description: Must match a configured Source of Referral Source for this community.

stage.description: Must match a Stage configured for this community.

score.description: Must match Score value that's configured for this community.

marketingStatus.description: Must be one of: not set, subscribed or unsubscribed.

externalID.description: ID used to reference this document in the vendor's system.

itemName.description: Must match the name of a Compliance item configured for this community.

documentFileName.description: File name with extension, used to save the document and reference it on the local file system.

documentBase64.description: PDF document bytes as a Base64 string. Note: decoded document must not be protected, locked or encrypted.

utcExpireDate.description: UTC Date and time the document is no longer valid or considered expired. Defaults to Never and will be maintained as valid.
